content: Both of my parents were unemployed, but they didn't let that stop them from properly looking after me and my 23 brothers and sisters.
translations: ita:Entrambi i miei genitori erano disoccupati, ma non lasciò che ciò impedisse loro di accudire adeguatamente me e i miei v
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by User22901 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
